STUDY: Chronic Kidney Disease with Type 2 Diabetes Study

INCLUSION CRITERIA:
1. Adults aged 18 to 75 years at enrollment
2. Diagnosis of Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus in the past 5 years
3. Chronic Kidney Disease Stage 3 or 4 (eGFR 15-59 mL/min/1.73m²)
4. Currently prescribed and taking Metformin for at least 90 consecutive days

EXCLUSION CRITERIA:
1. History of heart failure or acute myocardial infarction
2. Chronic Kidney Disease Stage 5 (eGFR <15 mL/min/1.73m²)
3. Active malignancy (cancer diagnosis in the past 2 years)
4. Pregnancy or nursing
